bibl.title: The Strategus of P. Oxy. II 283 and Iteration in the Strategia.
bibl.note: Pasion is not possible as a reading in P. Oxy. II, 283, 1. Ti. Claudius Pasion had only one term as strategus of the Oxyrhynchite. Iteration in the strategia was not unknown in the Roman period. - Appendix: Strategi of Roman Egypt serving more than one term of office.
bibl.seg: Whitehorne John Edwin George, The Strategus of P. Oxy. II 283 and Iteration in the Strategia.

Pasion is not possible as a reading in P. Oxy. II, 283, 1. Ti. Claudius Pasion had only one term as strategus of the Oxyrhynchite. Iteration in the strategia was not unknown in the Roman period. - Appendix: Strategi of Roman Egypt serving more than one term of office.
